title: FS or FT - Looking for T207 and V100
author: shepbuckman

posts.post_title: FS or FT - Looking for T207 and V100
posts.post_content:
I have a T207 Delehanty, SCG 2 I'm looking to sell or trade.  Currently working on T207 and V100 sets.

Have lots of other trade bait, including:
1901 Ogden's Guinea Gold Shakespeare SGC 4.5
1926 Exhibits Sissler SGC 1
1928 Harrington's Lloyd Waner SGC 3.5
1933 Delong Rabbit Maranville SGC 1.5

MANY 1950's SGC graded HOFers
